QuestData.Title: Twilight Scheming
QuestData.Description: In Blackrock Depths, Twilight's Hammer has started to persuade the Dark Irons to strengthen their alliance and prepare their armies for a campaign outside the mountain.$B$BWe must not allow this manipulation to create a combined Dark Iron-Twilight's Hammer force! We must destroy the tools of the cult's persuasion.$B$BI want you to go into Domicile portion of Blackrock Depths and use this torch to burn the books that the Twilight's Hammer is distributing there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Glowing Torch to destroy 8 copies of The Twilight Creed in the Domicile of Blackrock Depths.

Objectives.Objective: Copies of The Twilight Creed burned
